metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39891 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 8.0, access tokens created as part of admin's impersonation of a user are not cleared at the end of impersonation which may lead to unnecessary sensitive info disclosure.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
